name: FamilyMemberHistory
title: FamilyMemberHistory
description: Significant health conditions for a person related to the patient relevant in the context of care for the patient.

elements.name: FamilyMemberHistory
elements.description: Significant health conditions for a person related to the patient relevant in the context of care for the patient.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Business identifiers assigned to this family member history by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

elements.name: instantiatesCanonical
elements.description: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this FamilyMemberHistory.

elements.name: instantiatesUri
elements.description: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this FamilyMemberHistory.

elements.name: status
elements.description: A code specifying the status of the record of the family member history of a specific family member.

elements.name: dataAbsentReason
elements.description: Describes why the family member history is not available.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: The person who this history concerns.

elements.name: date
elements.description: The date (and possibly time) when the family member history was recorded or last updated.

elements.name: name
elements.description: This will either be a name or a description of the family member.

elements.name: relationship
elements.description: The type of relationship this person has to the patient (father, mother, brother etc.).

elements.name: sex
elements.description: The birth sex of the family member.

elements.name: bornPeriod
elements.description: The actual or approximate date of birth of the family member.

elements.name: bornDate
elements.description: The actual or approximate date of birth of the family member.

elements.name: bornString
elements.description: The actual or approximate date of birth of the family member.

elements.name: ageAge
elements.description: The age of the family member at the time of death or at the time the family member history is recorded.

elements.name: ageRange
elements.description: The age of the family member at the time of death or at the time the family member history is recorded.

elements.name: ageString
elements.description: The age of the family member at the time of death or at the time the family member history is recorded.

elements.name: estimatedAge
elements.description: If true, indicates that the age value specified is an estimated value.

elements.name: deceasedBoolean
elements.description: Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the family member at the time of death for the family member history record.

elements.name: deceasedAge
elements.description: Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the family member at the time of death for the family member history record.

elements.name: deceasedRange
elements.description: Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the family member at the time of death for the family member history record.

elements.name: deceasedDate
elements.description: Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the family member at the time of death for the family member history record.

elements.name: deceasedString
elements.description: Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the family member at the time of death for the family member history record.

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: Describes why the family member history is being performed.

elements.name: reasonReference
elements.description: Indicates a Condition, Observation, AllergyIntolerance, or QuestionnaireResponse that justifies this family member history event.

elements.name: note
elements.description: This property allows a non condition-specific note to the made about the related person.

elements.name: condition
elements.description: The significant Conditions (or condition) that the family member had.
